text: Joseph Franklin Beard (born May 1, 1939) is an American former professional golfer. He was a member of the PGA Tour and Champions Tour. Beard won eleven PGA Tour events. He was born in Dallas, Texas. Beard has also worked as a golf commentator on ESPN.
